title: Reddit
cleaned_text: Meditation [r/Meditation](/r/Meditation/) This community is for sharing experiences, stories and instruction relating to the practice of meditation. I'm not saying it does. But I'm a bit of a conspiracy theorist. But that fucker hurt. So much it gave me ghost COVID for 2 days. I already don't trust the news, government or publicity. Not an anti vaxer but I'm curious. I haven't been able to meditate recently.
